title: Emerald Peacock Polki Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: Zambian Emerald. Features a fine Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a central rectangular Zambian Emerald pendant, flanked by intricately detailed peacock motifs. The entire necklace is studded with uncut Polki diamonds, each carefully set in a closed setting to enhance their natural luster. The peacock design, a symbol of beauty and grace in South Indian culture, adds a traditional touch. The back of the pendant features delicate filigree work (jali work) for added elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant green of the emerald. The Polki diamonds exhibit a subtle
milky white hue that complements the gold beautifully. A hint of red in the peacock's eyes adds a touch of detail.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. It can also be styled for high-end parties and cultural events.
description: This is a truly unique piece that blends traditional craftsmanship with the brilliance of uncut diamonds and the regal appeal of Emeralds. The peacock design adds a touch of South Indian heritage, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty and value. A statement piece that will be treasured for generations.
